2019

DHAS

Text, photo and video news systems for only subscribers.

2018

Biges B2B Platform

E-commerce portals. Buyers and sellers meet on the same website. On these platforms, designing such as price offering, bidding and bidding can be realized.

Smart City Project

Tracking the bus, taxi and other vehicles belonging to Denizli municipality.

2016

School Road Project

All information about student services comes to your phone. "When will the service arrive?", "Has my child reached the school?", "When will the service arrive at home?" Details such as instant notifications come to your phone.

Bullwark ACS Project

Access control system. Controlling the entry and exit of employees with finger and face reading systems.

Tracking System Project

Tracking where child, animal, valuables are on the world via instant map. Also, learning alarms and violations instantly.

2014-2015

Created reporting & analysis support, microsites and web applications for pharma and life sciences companies in their digital endeavours.
